synopsis.text: Will the power of the cursed sword Shiryū consume Gai, or will he harness it to protect humanity? Adopted by the swordsmith Amon after being found beside his deceased birth mother, Gai becomes Amon's apprentice and loses his right arm during a forging accident. To aid him, Amon crafts Gai a new arm from the demonic sword Shiryū, allowing him to merge with the weapon and battle his foes. As the sword's power intensifies within him, Gai struggles to contain its bloodlust. Meanwhile, the enigmatic Gabi and the Shoshidai organization work together to safeguard the world from the Busoma. Can Gai resist the sword's murderous desires and defend mankind alongside his allies? Dive into the thrilling world of "Swordgai The Animation" to discover the fate of Gai and his companions.
